Detailed Description

PeriodicStrategy.h is a construct for ASE. Most strategies extend it. It contains methods and variables to start, stop, pause, resume and restart the strategy.

Author:
David Johan Christensen, Modular Robotics Lab, AdapTronics Group, Maersk Institute, University of Southern Denmark
